img.alt: Naugatuck High School exterior, cloudy day

div.p: Naugatuck Public Schools consist of 1 pre-kindergarten school, 5 elementary schools, 2 intermediate schools, 1 middle school, 1 high school and an Adult and Continuing Education program.

img.alt: Andrew Avenue Elementary student playing under a parachute
Naugy Kids Run - students running on track
Grad walk - High School graduates get high-fives from elementary students
Andrew Aveune staff dancing as robots in a pep rally

div.p: Naugatuck employs about 250 certified teachers and 200 other staff members including nurses, paraprofessionals, counselors, administrators.
